sections.title: Low Templar (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Low Templar class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Low Templar)
sections.description: Low templars are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, all forms of armor, and shields.

sections.title: Crusader (Ex) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Grants scaling bonuses to attack rolls, damage rolls, and Will saves against chaotic evil outsiders, increasing from +1 at 1st level to +4 at 10th level.

sections.title: Flag of Convenience (Ex) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Provides +2 bonuses to Bluff, Disguise, and Linguistics checks for forgeries, plus special benefits to Leadership feat usage including no penalties for moving or losing followers.

sections.title: Dirty Fighting (Ex) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Eliminates non-proficiency penalties with improvised weapons, grants +2 to combat maneuvers, and allows replacing critical hit damage with status effects.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Functions like the rogue's sneak attack ability, dealing +1d6 extra damage at 3rd level and +2d6 at 8th level when attacking flat-footed or flanked enemies.

sections.title: Path of Darkness/Path of Light (Su) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Allows the low templar to mask one aspect of their alignment from magical detection and gain +2 Diplomacy bonuses with creatures of specific alignment subtypes.

sections.title: Live to Fight Another Day (Ex) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Allows using the withdraw action as a standard action instead of a full-round action, but limits movement to normal speed.

sections.title: Ruthless (Ex) (Low Templar)
sections.description: When killing or dropping a foe to dying with a melee attack, grants an immediate swift action attack with the same weapon plus character level bonus damage.

sections.title: Parting Shot (Ex) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Upgrades Live to Fight Another Day, allowing the withdraw action as a move action instead of standard action.

sections.title: Damnation/Redemption (Su) (Low Templar)
sections.description: Allows masking a second alignment trait and grants a planar cohort as if having the Leadership feat, with special benefits if already possessing Leadership.
